Title: Davi Geiger
Body: Date: Mon, 25 Nov 1996 22:03:07 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.1 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Thu, 17 Oct 1996 22:50:42 GMT Content-length: 1471 Davi Geiger Davi Geiger Visiting Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences New York University Current reserach projects: Articulated object recognition Junction Detection Medical Imaging Stereo Symmetric-axis Graduate students: Tyng-Luh Liu Laxmi Parida Recent papers: Sparse Representations for Image Decomposition with Occlusions with Mike Donahue, Robert Hummel and Tyng-Luh Liu.
